# Arista eAPI Exporter

[![License MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Brought by Enix](https://img.shields.io/badge/Brought%20to%20you%20by-ENIX-%23377dff?labelColor=888&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://enix.io)

A Prometheus exporter for Arista's EOS that uses the eAPI and can be easily extended to support more metrics. 

Work in progress
